mapper.sql: ID, BMBM, BMMC, BQDF, BQPM, SQDF, SQPM, PMBHZ, TJNF, TJYF, QHBM, QHMC, GXSJ
mapper.insert: insert into T_ZHJC_YX_BMDF (ID, BMBM, BMMC, BQDF, BQPM, SQDF, SQPM, PMBHZ, TJNF, TJYF, QHBM, QHMC, GXSJ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bqdf,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bqpm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sqdf,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sqpm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{PMBHZ,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{tjnf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tjyf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qhbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gxsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into T_ZHJC_YX_BMDF
ID,
BMBM,
BMMC,
BQDF,
BQPM,
SQDF,
SQPM,
PMBHZ,
TJNF,
TJYF,
QHBM,
QHMC,
GXSJ,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bmbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bqdf,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{bqpm,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{sqdf,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{sqpm,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{PMBHZ,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

#{gxsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update T_ZHJC_YX_BMDF
BMBM = #{bmbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BMMC = #{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BQDF = #{bqdf,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
BQPM = #{bqpm,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SQDF = #{sqdf,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SQPM = #{sqpm,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PMBHZ = #{PMBHZ,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
TJNF = #{tjnf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TJYF = #{tjyf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QHBM = #{qhbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QHMC = #{qhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GXSJ = #{gxsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_ZHJC_YX_BMDF set BMBM = #{bmbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BMMC = #{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BQDF = #{bqdf,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BQPM = #{bqpm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SQDF = #{sqdf,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SQPM = #{sqpm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PMBHZ = #{PMBHZ,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TJNF = #{tjnf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TJYF = #{tjyf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QHBM = #{qhbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QHMC = #{qhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GXSJ = #{gxsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( select nvl(a.short_name,b.bmmc)as shortname,nvl(b.bqdf,0)as bqdf,nvl(b.sqdf,0)as sqdf,nvl(b.bqpm,0)as bqpm,nvl(b.sqpm,0)as sqpm, nvl(b.pmbhz,-1)as pmbhz,b.bmbm bmbm from (select t.dept_code,t.short_name from eb_t_department t where t.p_id='4028f3e95f85249f015f8543542e0001' ) a left join ( select BQDF bqdf,SQDF sqdf,BQPM bqpm,SQPM sqpm,PMBHZ pmbhz,bmbm,bmmc from T_ZHJC_YX_BMDF where TJNF = #{year} and TJYF =#{month} ) b on a.dept_code=b.bmbm order by b.bqpm) where shortname is not null
